data.name: Referred
data.title: Hi Julia
data.body: Your credit check was successful but we unfortunately couldn't complete your affordability check.
data.summary:
Unfortunately, something went wrong on our side. We can’t give you an indication of the loan amount we can offer you right now. Please try again later.

For a comprehensive assessment, please complete the full application form.

If you have any further questions, please call us on 0860 911 007.
